Tips

  • Don't forget to use different tags! There are not only divs and spans!
  • It's a good practice to use height and width with images
  • Unordered lists are often used for navigation, socials, list of news, etc. (Людоедский интерфейс в том числе об этом)

Checklist

  • Only one CSS file inside <head>
  • Links and buttons
  • No inputs without form (except sliders)
  • No inline elements for layout
  • Careful with <br>
  • Check on validity
